features.name: Draconic Ancestry
features.description: You have draconic ancestry. Choose one type of dragon from the Draconic Ancestry table. Your breath weapon and damage resistance are determined by the damage type chosen.

features.name: Breath Weapon - Brass
features.description: You can use your action to exhale destructive energy. Your brass draconic ancestry means this exhalation is a 5 by 30 ft. line dealing fire damage.
features.usage: Once per short or long rest
